title: CrashLoopBackOff in payment service
description: Pod for payment service is restarting repeatedly due to config map error.

title: High CPU in frontend pods
description: Frontend deployment in production is consuming high CPU leading to degraded performance.

title: Readiness probe failed in catalog service
description: Catalog service pods not passing readiness probe due to slow backend startup.

title: OOMKilled in recommendation engine
description: Recommendation engine pods are getting killed due to out of memory errors.

title: ImagePullBackOff in inventory service
description: Pods are stuck in ImagePullBackOff due to incorrect image name.

title: Node disk pressure
description: Node is under disk pressure causing pod evictions and scheduling failures.

title: Service unreachable in staging namespace
description: The internal DNS is not resolving for the analytics service.

title: Pod pending due to unschedulable node
description: No node meets the affinity rules defined for backend deployment.

title: PVC stuck in pending
description: Persistent volume claim for logging service is pending due to unavailable storage class.

title: Horizontal Pod Autoscaler not scaling
description: CPU usage is high but autoscaler for frontend is not increasing replicas.

title: Liveness probe failed in user-api service
description: Liveness probe is incorrectly configured, causing frequent restarts.

title: Ingress controller misconfiguration
description: Ingress controller is failing to route traffic to backend services due to incorrect annotations.

title: Secrets missing in deployment
description: Application is failing to start due to missing secrets in the environment.

title: Node not ready
description: Worker node is in NotReady state due to kubelet failure.

title: Evicted pods due to memory pressure
description: Multiple pods have been evicted on node-1 due to memory pressure.

title: Kube-proxy not running
description: Cluster networking is down due to kube-proxy service failure.

title: CrashLoop in Redis pod
description: Redis container crashes due to missing volume mounts.

title: Init container failure in billing service
description: Init container is failing due to script timeout in billing service.

title: Container image pull rate limit
description: Pods are failing to start due to DockerHub pull rate limit.

title: Kube DNS crashloop
description: Kube DNS pods are crashing leading to service resolution failures.

title: Helm release upgrade failed
description: Upgrade of shopping-cart helm chart failed due to resource conflict.

title: Cluster autoscaler not removing idle nodes
description: Idle nodes are not being scaled down in dev cluster causing resource wastage.

title: Pod security policy violation
description: Deployment failed due to disallowed hostPath volume in policy.

title: NetworkPolicy blocking traffic
description: NetworkPolicy is overly restrictive and blocking service-to-service communication.

title: HorizontalPodAutoscaler error
description: HPA controller logs show error: unable to get metrics for resource.

title: Stuck terminating pods
description: Pods are stuck in Terminating state due to finalizer misconfiguration.

title: ConfigMap change not triggering pod restart
description: Pods are not picking up new config due to missing checksum annotation.

title: Metrics server unavailable
description: HPA and kubectl top not working due to metrics-server being offline.

title: Service load balancer stuck in pending
description: LoadBalancer type service not getting external IP due to cloud provider issue.

title: Etcd pod restart
description: Etcd pod crashed due to out-of-memory error, affecting control plane stability.
